transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Good evening sir. Nidhi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji madam bataiye.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji madam.
Customer: Hello sir aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Aawaz aa rahi hai madam bahut halki aa rahi hai kat ke aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ek minute sir. Abhi ja rahi hai aawaz? Hello.
Customer: Haan aawaz aa rahi hai piche se shor bahut aa raha.
Executive: Accha theek hai. Koi baat nahi sir. Ek minute aapka sir feedback aaya tha basically account manager se connect karne ka right sir?
Customer: Ji madam ji madam.
Executive: Haan ji sir to main hi aapke account manager hu sir. Main aapko whatsapp pe bhi connect kar leti hu. Aur sir basically baat kar rahi thi aapka kya tha sir feedback kya tha sir abhi?
Customer: Ji madam.
Executive: Feedback kya hai sir aapka? Feedback.
Customer: Madam abhi kya abhi madam kya hai feedback nahi hai abhi to humko ye hai ki jo hamari pe jo hamara chal raha hai na isme thoda buyleads vagaira hamari thodi proper nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Proper nahi aa pa rahi to uske liye thoda sa humko uske andar changes vagaira karne hai aapka thoda sa usme hame sahyog chahiye hoga aapka rai chahiye hogi kaise usme behtar kar payenge.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai sir. To abhi sir aap haan ji bataiye.
Customer: Ji bataiye. Aap ek baar na usko account ko thoda sa aap dekhenge na kya hai kya nahi hai. To usme aapka suggestion hame mil jaye ki hum kis tarike se usko behtar kar sakte hain. Kya kya cheez hum galti kar rahe hain jo remove karni hai hame na to wo thodi cheeze ho jayengi to shayad behtar ho jayega kuch.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir. Dekhiye sir isme kya hai na ki sabse pehle to hum isme yahi discuss karenge ki like hamara call response rate kya hai sir. Theek hai? To call response rate jaise ki hamare paas jo bhi calls vagaira aati hai na to hum kis tarike se answer karte hain to hamara call response rate normal 72% ka hai sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Dusra haan ji dusra jo hai sir jaise buyleads ka hai. To buyleads jo hai na sir hame consume karna hai hame. Abhi jo hame recent jo abhi buyleads aayi hui hai. Abhi main aapke recent aaj ki agar main baat karu ek minute sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji sir. To agar main buyleads ki baat karu sir to hame jo buyleads aayi hai sir hame daily basis pe consume karna rehta hai sir. Theek hai? Consume isliye karna hota hai sir jaise ki aapne abhi jo service le rakhi hai. Theek hai? To aap sabse jyada agar deal karte ho sir agar jis category se sabse jyada aapko jo leads aati hai aur jo aap consume karte ho. To wo sir aap jis category ki karte ho wo hai sir aapka. Isme sir hame na thoda sa sir improve karne ki jarurat hai. Theek hai? Aapne sir do aapne jo jo category me le rakhi hai sir. Usme jaise ki aapka brass handicraft ho gaya, brass gifts articles ho gaya, metal handicraft, brass. To isme kya hai na sir ki hame aur isme like isme leads consume karne ki jarurat hai. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji. Haan ji. Aur kuch kuch aise sir hamare paas like categories jisme sir kuch kuch aise ki products added nahi hai jaise ki aapka gold idols hai. Theek hai wedding gifts hai isme na hamare paas na sir products added nahi hai. Theek hai? To hame ye bhi matlab improve karne ki jarurat hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To aur kuch aise hai sir jiski hamari mapping name sahi karane ki jarurat hai to ye sari cheeze sir hum discuss karenge.
Customer: Theek hai madam. Theek hai.
Executive: Haan haan ji sir. Aur hamara jo main catalog quality score hai sir wo 50% ka hai. Matlab bahut sare sir hamare products hain jiska sir proper information sir added nahi hai to ye bhi hame karane ki jarurat hai sir. Ab main aapko kuch main aapko products haan ji sir. To ye ye bhi hamara ek bahut important major role play karta hai isme.
Customer: Theek hai madam.
Executive: Dusra sir agar main reviews ki baat karu ki abhi hamara jo reviews kitna chal raha hai to reviews sir basically hamara 4.4 ka rating hai. To aapka lead manager me jaise hi aapki koi bhi deal ho jati hai waha pe ask for review ka option rehta hai. To jo bhi client aapke sath fix bhi ho unse sir aap reviews le kar ke apni rating ka badha sakte ho sir.
Customer: Theek hai madam. Theek hai.
Executive: Haan ji. Haan ji sir. To ye sari cheezon pe sir hum discuss karenge sir. Baki agar main aap matlab buyleads vagaira jitna aap sir consume karoge utna hi jyada aapko benefit rahega sir. To abhi sir aap kaha pe matlab abhi aap system ke paas ho sir ya fir like abhi kahi bahar ho sir aap?
Customer: Aisa hai madam main to abhi apne office me hi hu. Aapko na jo bhi ye connection hoga na ye mera beta karega aapke baad. Wahi sari cheeze isme adjust aur jo karna hai wo karega.
Executive: Accha to wahi sari cheezon me discuss karenge. Haan ji sir to ek kaam karte hain sir. Haan haan bataiye.
Customer: To ye hai ki main aapko unka contact number bhej dunga usko aapka bhej dunga. Aur fir jo hai wo jo bhi cheeze hongi wo cheeze aap jaise suggestion dengi ya jaise wo kuch puchna chahega us hisab se us cheez ko handle kar lenge.
Executive: Haan ji sir haan ji. To abhi sir na aapna kuch agar hai to fir possible to fir aap kuch leads sir aap consume kar lo. Wo beneficial rahega sir aapko. Theek hai? Aap sir leads me consume kar haan ji sir aap consume kar lo jo bhi abhi aapko recent me bhi jo leads aayi hui hai. To aap use consume kar lo sir. Theek hai? Baki sir abhi na abhi ke liye aapka jo aapka jo feedback aaya tha sir account manager ko connect karne ka sir to main is like feedback ko bhi close kar sakti hu sir sir ko?
Customer: Haan haan nahi nahi koi dikkat nahi hai wo to actual me humko pata chala humne unko Himanshu ji se baat kari thi na. To
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Himanshu ji bole main to chala gaya hu to aapka jo naye hai aap unko baat kijiyega to fir humne isliye phone kara tha aapko aur koi baat nahi.
Executive: Accha haan ji haan ji sir. To abhi sir kya hai na ki call ke baad na aapko like ek proper sir ek feedback link jayega sir ki aap meri call se satisfied the ya nahi. To aap please usme sir aap like rating mujhe de dena sir. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Ji theek hai madam. Theek hai madam theek hai.
Executive: Okay okay sir. Main aapko whatsapp pe bhi connect kar leti hu sir aur aap mujhe like unka aap number mujhe de sakte ho sir aur kal ke liye google meet arrange kar leti hu sir.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai madam theek hai.
Executive: Okay thank you sir.
Executive: Thank you so much for your time sir. Thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyleads are not coming properly.

- Needs changes to improve buyleads.

- Wants to know how to improve account.

- Wants to know mistakes to remove.

- Products not added in categories.

- Mapping name needs correction.

- Catalog quality score is 50%.

- Proper information not added to products.



Resolution:

- Executive discussed call response rate.

- Explained the importance of consuming buyleads daily.

- Suggested improving categories for leads.

- Discussed improving products and mapping names.

- Talked about catalog quality score.

- Explained the importance of reviews.

- Executive will connect on WhatsApp.

- Will arrange a Google Meet for tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Customer's son will handle the account.

- Customer will send contact number of his son.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog, reviews, account, categories
